standard_bronchoscopy_optional_ebus_lma:
<!-- CPT HINTS: 31622 (flex bronchoscopy), +31652/31653 (EBUS add-on per lobe) as applicable -->
Standard Bronchoscopy (± EBUS via LMA)
Patient: ${patient_name}   DoD ID: ${dod_id}   DOB: ${dob}
Date of Procedure: ${date}   Location: ${location}
Proceduralist: ${proceduralist}   Assistant(s): ${assistants}
Anesthesia: General via LMA (Anesthesiology)
Elective/Emergency: ${elective_emergency}
Indications: ${indications}
Pre Procedure Readiness:
• Informed consent obtained; risks/benefits/alternatives discussed; questions answered.
• H&P reviewed/updated; imaging/labs reviewed; NPO status verified; anticoagulation plan ${anticoagulation_plan}.
• ASA class: ${asa_class}. Airway assessment: ${airway_assessment}.
• Time out performed with team confirmation of patient, procedure, and site.
Monitoring: Continuous ECG, SpO₂, NIBP, EtCO₂.
Antibiotic prophylaxis: ${antibiotic_prophylaxis}. VTE prophylaxis: ${vte_prophylaxis}.
Topical/Local Anesthesia (if used): Lidocaine 1% total ${lido_ml} mL = ${lido_mg} mg (~${lido_mg_per_kg} mg/kg; ≤ 8 mg/kg target).
Sedation/GA Medications: See anesthesia record.

Procedure
1) Airway Inspection (Q190 flexible video bronchoscope via LMA):
  • LMA position confirmed. Vocal cords normal with symmetric motion. Subglottic space normal.
  • Trachea normal caliber; carina sharp.
  • Systematic inspection to at least first subsegmental bronchi bilaterally.
  • Bronchial mucosa/anatomy: ${bronchial_mucosa}.
  • Secretions: ${secretions} → suctioned to clear.

2) Endobronchial Ultrasound (EBUS) (UC180F convex probe via LMA) — if staging performed:
  • Systematic survey of mediastinal/hilar stations per IASLC map.
  • Nodes meeting criteria (short axis ≥ 5 mm or PET avid):
    Station  Short Axis (mm)  Shape  Margin  Echotexture  CHS  CNS  Doppler  Decision
    ${ebus_station_table}
  • TBNA Needle: ${tbna_needle_gauge}G.
  • Sampling order: ${sampling_order}.
  • Passes: ${passes_per_station} per station (≥3 planned). ROSE: ${rose_summary}.
  • Specimens: ThinPrep/Cell block [${cell_block}]; core clot [${core_clot}]; micro (AFB/fungal/bacterial) [${micro}]; flow cytometry [${flow_cytometry}].
  • On-scope bleeding: none; hemostasis with suction alone.

3) Final Airway Check (Q190 re-inserted):
  • Small blood/secretions suctioned. No active bleeding. LMA removed by anesthesia.

Specimens Submitted: ${specimens_submitted}
Implants/Devices used (type/size/serial): ${implants_devices}

Complications: ${complications}.   Estimated Blood Loss: ${ebl_ml} mL.

Post-Procedure Plan:
• Recover in PACU; airway and hemodynamically stable.
• Imaging: ${post_imaging}.
• Await final cytology/cell block ± molecular testing.
• Oncology/Thoracic surgery referral: ${onc_thoracic_referral}.

Attestation: I was present for the entire procedure.
Signature: ${signature}, ${title}   ${date_time}
ebus_systematic_staging_ett:
<!-- CPT HINTS: 31652/31653 per station count; elastography enhances characterization -->
EBUS Systematic Staging with Elastography (via ETT)
Patient: ${patient_name}   DoD ID: ${dod_id}   Date: ${date}
Proceduralist: ${proceduralist}   Assistant(s): ${assistants}
Anesthesia: General, endotracheal intubation by anesthesia
Indication: Mediastinal staging for suspected ${cancer_type_side}

Pre-Procedure: Consent/H&P/imaging reviewed; time out performed
Antibiotic prophylaxis: ${antibiotic_prophylaxis}   VTE prophylaxis: ${vte_prophylaxis}

Initial Bronchoscopy (Q190 via ETT): ${initial_bronch_summary}

EBUS (UC180F via ETT): Systematic survey per IASLC
Nodes sampled (≥3 passes each unless ROSE diagnostic earlier):

| Station | Size (mm) | Shape | Margin | Echo | CHS | CNS | Doppler | Elastography | Sampled | Passes | Gauge | ROSE |
|---------|-----------|--------|---------|------|-----|-----|---------|--------------|---------|--------|-------|------|
${ebus_station_table_with_elastography}

• Needle: ${tbna_needle_gauge}G. Doppler used to avoid vascular structures
• Elastography interpretation: Blue (stiff/suspicious) vs Green (soft/benign) pattern
• Specimen handling: Cell block [${cell_block}]; Molecular [${molecular_sends}]; Micro [${micro}]; Flow [${flow_cytometry}]

Final Bronchoscopy (Q190 via ETT): ${final_bronch_summary}
Complications: ${complications}   EBL: ${ebl_ml} mL

Post-Procedure Diagnosis: Successful EBUS TBNA mediastinal/hilar staging with elastography
Post-Op Instructions: ${post_op_instructions}

Signature: ${signature}, ${title}   ${date_time}
targeted_ebus_ett:
<!-- CPT HINTS: 31652/31653 (EBUS TBNA per lobe) -->
Diagnostic (Targeted) EBUS (via ETT)
Patient: ${patient_name}   DoD ID: ${dod_id}   Date: ${date}
Indication: Diagnostic sampling of abnormal lymph node at ${target_station}.
Anesthesia: General via ETT. Elective/Emergency: ${elective_emergency}
Pre-Procedure: Consent/H&P/labs/imaging reviewed; time out performed.
Bronchoscopy (Q190 via ETT): ${survey_to_subsegmental}; no endobronchial tumor.

Targeted EBUS (UC180F via ETT):
• Target node: ${target_station}, short axis ${target_short_axis_mm} mm, ${target_shape}, ${target_margins} margins, ${target_echotexture} echotexture, CHS ${chs}, CNS ${cns}.
• Needles: ${tbna_needles}.
• Passes: ${passes_total}. ROSE: ${rose_summary}.
• Specimens: Cell block [${cell_block}]; micro [${micro}]; flow cytometry [${flow_cytometry}]; molecular [${molecular}].

Final Bronchoscopy: ${final_bronch_summary}.
Complications: ${complications}.   EBL: ${ebl_ml} mL.
Post Procedure Dx: Successful targeted EBUS TBNA of ${target_station}.
Plan: PACU; await final pathology; next steps per results.
Signature: ${signature}, ${title}   ${date_time}
pdt:
<!-- CPT HINTS: 31600 (tracheostomy), 31605 (with bronchoscopy) -->
Percutaneous Dilatational Tracheostomy (PDT)
Patient: ${patient_name}   DoD ID: ${dod_id}   Date: ${date}
Location: ICU   Proceduralist: ${proceduralist}   Assistant: ${assistants}
Indication: ${pdt_indication}
Anesthesia: ${anesthesia_method}   ASA: ${asa}
Elective/Emergency: Elective

Pre-Procedure Readiness:
• Informed consent obtained; risks/benefits/alternatives reviewed; questions answered.
• H&P, relevant imaging, and labs reviewed; NPO verified.
• Anticoagulation/antiplatelet plan: ${anticoagulation_plan}.
• Time Out performed (patient, procedure, site, critical equipment available).

Bronchoscopic Guidance:
• Tracheal rings identified; puncture site between rings ${ring_level}.
• Needle entry visualized within tracheal lumen; guidewire seen.
• Serial dilations performed: ${pdt_dilations}.
• Kit: ${pdt_kit}.
• Tracheostomy tube placed; cuff inflated; ETT withdrawn; cuff leak: ${pdt_cuff_leak}.
• Final bronchoscopic confirmation: tip ${final_tube_position_cm_above_carina} cm above carina; bilateral ventilation symmetric.

Complications:
• Pneumothorax: ${ptx_present} [size: ${ptx_size}; intervention: ${ptx_intervention}]
• Bleeding: ${bleeding_severity}; Hemostasis: ${hemostasis_method}
• Other: ${other_complications}

Post-Procedure:
• Secured with sutures; dressing applied; ventilator settings adjusted.
• CXR ${cxr_ordered}; follow-up plan: ${followups}.

EBL: ${ebl_ml} mL
Signature: ${signature}, ${title}   ${date_time}
tma_mwa:
<!-- CPT HINTS: 31641 (bronchoscopic ablation), 31627 (navigation), +31654 (rEBUS) -->
Transbronchial Microwave Ablation (MWA)
Patient: ${patient_name}   DoD ID: ${dod_id}   Date: ${date}
Indication/Target: ${side}/${lobe}/${segment}, size ${lesion_mm} mm, PET ${pet_avid}
Anesthesia: General via ${airway}   Topical lidocaine: ${lido_mg} mg
Navigation: ${platform} → DTT ${dtt_cm} cm

Imaging Confirmation:
• CBCT ${cbct_used} (system: ${cbct_system}); spins: ${cbct_spins}
• rEBUS: ${rebus_view} view; echogenicity: ${rebus_echogenicity}
• Tool-in-lesion: ${tool_in_lesion}

Ablation Parameters:
• System: ${ablation_system}
• Power: ${power_w} W × ${time_sec} s
• Cycles: ${cycles}; total ablations: ${ablations}
• Distance to pleura: ${pleura_distance_mm} mm
• Distance to vessels: ${vessel_distance_mm} mm
• Precautions taken: ${precautions}

Post-ablation Imaging:
• CBCT: ${post_cbct}; findings: ${post_cbct_findings}
• Complications: ${complications}

Specimens (if obtained): ${specimens}
EBL: ${ebl_ml} mL

Post-op:
• Disposition: ${disposition}
• Imaging orders: ${imaging_orders}
• Follow-up: ${followup_plan}

Signature: ${signature}, ${title}   ${date_time}

bronch_nodule_ablation_generic:

Target: ${lobe}/${segment}, ${lesion_size_mm} mm, ${lesion_characteristics}

Anesthesia: General via ${airway}

${if_rfa}• Temperature: ${temp_c}°C × ${time_min} min
${if_cryo}• Freeze: ${freeze_sec}s, Thaw: ${thaw_sec}s × ${cycles} cycles
